GSD.description:
xfrm: Update ipcomp_scratches with NULL when freed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 2c19945ce8095d065df550e7fe350cd5cc40c6e6. For more details please see the references link.
